summary: This bill, the "Enforce the Caps Act," amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to establish discretionary spending limits for fiscal years 2026 through 2029. It sets specific budget authority figures for the discretionary category in each of those years, aiming to control federal spending. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on June 26, 2025, and referred to the Committee on the Budget.
